question: Which country houses "Okavango Delta"?
explanation: Okavango Delta is located in Botswana. It is both UNESCO World Heritage Site and Ramsar Wetland. River Okavango forms this delta. It is an endorheic basin of Kalahari. Moremi Game Reserve is located on the eastern side of the delta. Okavango Delta is one of the seven natural wonders of Africa. After the flooding season of this delta, a special type of land will be formed due to the moisture presence called Molapo.
